name: Paw Puppy Smashy Patrol
description:
Endless 3D-runner from the first person with the prettiest puppies, for all ages! Large buttons and convenient controls, allow you to move to the right, left and jump. The game has no difficult obstacles, so even the smallest can ride indefinitely.

Key features:
- Funny cartoon graphics in 3D
- 3 different characters to choose from
- and much more

Select characters:
- Marshall
- Rocky
- Chase

In the future, other characters will be added
